header.title: Invite a friend
header.description: This mods enables your users to send emails to their friends and advice them of your board. Also enables registration-keys which must be entered to register and can only be obtained by 'Invite a friend'-emails.

changelog.change: [Fixed] Report #002: 'Invite a friend' shown in navigation

action-group.diy-instructions:
Delete the following files from 0.2.1: * /invite.php * /styles/prosilver/template/invite.html * /styles/subsilver2/template/invite.html
Purge the cache and browse to your SYSTEM-tab. Browse to -> User Control Panel (menu on the left hand side), enter UCP_INVITE, press the 'Create new module'-button and enable the module. Browse to the category just added (UCP->Invite a friend) and add 'Compose invitation' from the dropdown menu.
(images can be found in /contrib/install-folder)
